sentences.sContent: We do have a victory hymn, a victory hymn that's inscribed on a stele that's a slab of stone--which was erected in the year 1204 BCE.
sentences.sContent_eng: We do have a victory hymn, a victory hymn that's inscribed on a stele that's a slab of stone--which was erected in the year 1204 BCE.
sentences.sCn: 我们确实有胜利颂歌，刻在石碑上的胜利颂歌,那是一块石板，立于公元前1204年。

sentences.sContent: First published straight from the stele in 1902, the book begins by detailing the names of numerous members of the royal family dating back to the 1st Dynasty.
sentences.sContent_eng: First published straight from the stele in 1902, the book begins by detailing the names of numerous members of the royal family dating back to the 1st Dynasty.
sentences.sCn: 纸质书1902年出版，直接临摹石碑，书的开头不厌其烦地罗列从第一王朝以来无数王室成员的名字。

sentences.sContent: Collect archaic stele , portraits of Roman emperors, and pottery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Collect archaic stele , portraits of Roman emperors, and pottery.
sentences.sCn: 收藏古体的石碑、罗马皇帝的肖像和陶器。

trans.tranOther: an upright stone slab or column decorated with figures or inscriptions, common in prehistoric times
